levels.description: Summons an Obelisk upon a melee tile within this unit's Attack Range. When the Obelisk appears, it deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
